string.value: MBI Agent Falcon is still snooping around the old Haunted House, even after I helped him find some of the Paranormal Activity Report Pages! I wonder why... maybe he still needs help.

Looks like MBI Agent Falcon spoke too soon... 50 pages led him to the wrong, uh, dead guy... but he thinks that if I collect #b100#k more of them, he'll be able to catch Mr. Bones for sure! Whew... 100 pages. I wonder how many pages in total were in his original report?
I tracked down all of the 100 more #t4031764#s#k Agent Falcon requested! Now he can finally go track Mr. Bones... I hope.
Oh, hey there... it's you again. Er... you wouldn't happen to have some free time on your hands, would you?\r\n\r\n#L0##bDidn't I help you find Mr. Bones? What are you still doing around here?#l#k

With the information I had, I tracked down Mr. Bones' hiding place in the house. Well, uh... more accurately... what I thought was his hiding place. I found a Mr. Bones... but he turned out to be an old (and rather crotchety) skeleton, rather than the crafty ghost I'm looking for. <Cough>... He wasn't too happy that I woke him up. Nasty fellow.

#L0##bI can see your bruises.#l#k
#L1##bI already helped you! Can't you do your own job?!#l#k
Yes... unfortunately, they're as painful as they look. Can you help me make sure I don't make the same mistake again?

Um... well... I guess that's one way to look at it. Hmph... I thought civilians were always happy to help out on official Paranormal Investigation business. Well, if you do, you know where to find me.

Guess I was a tad bit hasty in my assumptions. I've realized that with only 50-some pages my file is still rather incomplete. Plus... uh... I tend to doodle a lot when I'm nervous, so a lot of the report pages you found are... um... just my drawings of ghosts and aliens. To be extra sure this time, let's get me #b100#k more #bParanormal Activity Report Pages#k. That should do the trick.
Hmph... I thought civilians were always happy to help out on official Paranormal Investigation business. Well, if you do, you know where to find me.

You got them? Fantastic! Here, let me have a look! Hmmm... By triangulating the data from Mr. Bones' movements from Page 407 with this page from his psychological profile, we can infer that... Yes! That makes sense! And then, if we cross-reference that with this chart from Page 75, we can deduce... Yes! Of course! Why didn't I think of that before?! Mr. Bones must be at- Oh, sorry, I almost forgot about you in my excitement!
Hmmm... not quite #b100 Paranormal Activity Report Pages#k yet. Like I said, I don't want to make the same mistake twice... getting beaten up by a bony old skeleton really hurts! Please keep looking!
